text: hpir'avnutaiya makkalin nilaimai, innum avarkalukku munnirunta varkalin nilaimai polave (ivarkalutaiya nilaimaiyum irukkiratu.) Avarkalum allahvutaiya vacanankalaip poyyakkik konte iruntanar. Atalal, avarkalin pavankalin karanamaka allah avarkalait tantittan. Niccayamaka allah mika valimaiyanavanum, vetanai ceyvatil mikak katinamanavanum avan
